description:
One summer day, a boy named Goro who`s bored with life receives a mysterious message on his phone: "Please record your wish." Goro jokingly says a wish out loud. Then, everything changes for him, and the KamiErabi battle to become God of the world begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare ni mo Kizukarenai, Dareshimo ga Yume ni Miru Basho de
Unnoticed by Anyone, in the Place of Which Everyone Dreams
誰にも気付かれない, 誰しもが夢に見る場所で
